name: LD Products
overview:
Hi,

My name is Sarah Jameson and I checked out your Crunch Base Site and was really impressed with your work. The layout, content and copy of your site is great and you have a wonderful audience. I’m with a company called LD Products and we would love to do some work with you. This could be either a guest blog post, Infographic, or a top 5-10 list. Just so you know who we are, our company is the leading provider of discount printer ink and toner for virtually every Inkjet or Laser Printer on the market. We own http://www.4inkjets.com, http://www.123inkjets.com and http://www.inkcartridges.com. If you are interested in us doing a guest blog post, our company will write an article for you that will be quality content and will not be “sales-like”. We are willing to do product reviews on all computer “printer, fax, copier, and even green technology” hardware sellers such as HP, Dell, ect… If you are interested please contact me @ blog_admin@ldproducts.com

-Sarah Jameson, LD Products
